Posts.Content: Martinez26 wrote: Hello, my name is michelle I'm 16 years old and a few days ago I was going to shower when I noticed a red spot with blood on my left breast and I didn't really think much of it but then the next day in the morning another dot appeared on my right breast but no blood and It's sort of bumpy but I left it alone. Then today I noticed a purple spot on one of my vains on my right breast I think it might of been red at one point because all the dots look identical in size and shape.. My breast have been hurting and feel fatigue I'm worried sick reading all these articles online please help. :/ None of my family memebers that I know of has had Any type of cancer.
